snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include revenue implications for a rush to mobile advertising, a new fight over domain names and an animated look at...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include revenue implications for a rush to mobile advertising, a new fight over domain names and an animated look at server problems with the new version of SimCity.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot:  Online Etiquette in Flux, and Facebook Hacking Defense
